title: Truth & Justice
content:encoded:
June 27, 2016 / Rabia interviews Bob Ruff from the Truth & Justice podcast and Emmy award winning actor, Jon Cryer, new host of Undisclosed Addenda.

Episode scoring music by Alex Fitch, AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Julian Sartorius, and Uncanny Valleys
